about_the_game:
• BECOME A PART OF COMMUNITY



    Introducing the ultimate dungeon experience!





    Step into a world of chaos and bullets with our thrilling new multiplayer rogue-like game! With up to 8 player online and LAN co-op, you can join forces with friends to battle through randomly generated dungeons filled with danger and mystery.

    • DISCOVER MANY UNIQUE WEAPONS

      From Keyboards to guns and everything in between, Greed Hunters features a wide variety of unique weapons for you to discover. Each weapon has its own strengths and weaknesses, allowing you to tailor your gameplay experience to your liking. So whether you prefer up-close and personal combat or long-range sniping, we've got you covered.



    • Randomly Generated Dungeons!

      With infinite seeded dungeon generation possibilities, no two playthroughs will ever be the same. Explore new environments, battle new enemies, and uncover new secrets with every run.

    • Greed System

      Each item you pick up has a potential curse that can make your journey more difficult. However, delivering the cursed items to the Greed Dealer can net you valuable rewards. The worse the curse, the better the reward. But beware, the Greed Dealer is a mysterious figure with his own motives. Will you take the risk and trade in cursed items for rewards, or play it safe? The choice is yours in our ultimate dungeon bullet hell experience.



    • Lan/On-line Co-op

      Team up with friends for the ultimate multiplayer experience. Whether you're playing online or on LAN, our co-op mode lets you work together to take down the toughest enemies and conquer the deadliest dungeons.

    • Controller Support

      Prefer to play with a gamepad? No problem! Our game supports controllers, so you can play however you like.

    • WE HAVE CAPYBARAS

      Yes that's everything on this point.

    Ready to explore the ultimate dungeon bullet hell experience? Grab your friends and get ready for a wild ride. Play now and see if you have what it takes to make it out alive!

short_description: Earn rewards for your greed in this chaotic, multiplayer rogue-like game. Explore randomly generated dungeons with up to 8 players in a world where greed is the currency. To survive, you must outsmart and out-hoard your teammates.

English*, Korean*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support
